long_description: With a blend of carbohydrates, amino acids, antioxidants and eletrolytes, GU Chomps(TM) energy chews give you something to sink your teeth into while pounding the pavement or hitting the trail. Sodium and potassium help restore an electrolyte balance. Chomps give you an energy boost with a 100% daily dose of vitamin C and E per serving. 1 packet of GU Chomps will fuel you for 1.5 - 2 hrs. of activity; hydrate as you go. Strawberry and Cranberry Apple flavors contain 20mg of caffeine per serving; Peach Tea contains 40mg; Blueberry Pomegranate, Orange, and Watermelon flavors are caffeine free. GU Chomps energy chews are gluten free and dairy free. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: With a blend of carbohydrates, amino acids, antioxidants and eletrolytes, GU Chomps(TM) energy chews give you something to sink your teeth into while pounding the pavement or hitting the trail.
